title.narrative: Civil Society & Accountability CSO research / operating environment

description.narrative: Increased capacity of CSOs and citizens to participate in development and accountability processes

Ireland’s support is focused on the provision of grants, and capacity development support to civil society organisations (CSOs) in programme, finance and partnership management; skills in facilitating citizens' participation in planning and budgeting of service delivery; support to organizations working on disability and access to services and inclusion for people with disabilities. Also focused on support to CSOs working to promote gender equality, prevent violence against women and girls (VAWG), and provision of rehabilitation and re-integration services, influencing national processes to adopt Family laws and capture regular data on VAWG and report on actions; provision of free legal aid services through community outreach wings of regional universities
